question: “The Saras Collection”, which showcases utility products made by rural self-help groups (SHGs), has been launched in which e-Commerce portal?
explanation:
Union Minister of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj Narendra Singh Tomar launched “The Saras Collection” on the Government e Marketplace (GeM) portal.
The Saras Collection showcases daily utility products made by rural self-help groups (SHGs). It is an initiative of GeM and the Deen Dayal Antyodaya Yojana-National Rural Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NRLM). It is launched with an objective of giving market access to rural SHGs thereby connecting them with Central and State Government buyers.
